name: Eyes of Luna
description:
You were mining on the Moon with your rover, when suddenly the Moon was destroyed. Somehow you survived the blast, and now must drive and fly through the debris field to locate the missing components for your rover, and stop the Eye before it gets to Earth and destroys it too.

Made  for the 10th Anniversary SpaceGameJunkie GameJam.

Controls

 Spacebar    - Skip through cutscenes

 F11         - Toggle fullscreen

 F1          - Toggle FPS counter

 ALT+F4      - Exit game

In-game controls

 Left click  - (If you have a gun) Fire at mouse cursor

 Right click - (If you have the scanner) Scan ahead of mouse cursor for object /paint target on radar

 A           - Drive left (wheels)

 D           - Drive right (wheels)

 Q           - Fire left thruster (spin right or fly up if holding E as well)

 E           - Fire right thruster (spin left or fly up if holding Q as well)

 S           - Fire downward thrusters (drop faster/simulate extra gravity)

Gameplay Instructions

 * Don't let anything bump into the window at the top of the cab of your rover

 * You'll need a scanner first to find your weapon

 * If you run out of fuel thrusters will be half as effective

 Sector A (start) - Find scanner, get extra fuel and find rubin coins

 Sector B & G     - A gun in each zone (get both for double fire rate), extra fuel, ammo, and rubin coins.

 Sector Z         - Enemy (boss) location, extra fuel, ammo, rubin coins
